entry.title: Bitcoin Shatters Profit-Taking Streak From 2021 Bull Run
entry.summary:
On-chain data shows the recent Bitcoin consecutive profit-taking day streak has now surpassed the longest run from the 2021 bull rally.
Bitcoin Has Now Seen 157 Straight Days Of Net Profit-Taking
As analyst James Van Straten explained as a new post on X, BTC has already surpassed the longest profit-taking spree from the previous bull run during this rally so far.
The relevant indicator here is the â€œNet Realized Profit/Loss,â€ which tracks the net amount of profit or loss (in USD) that Bitcoin investors as a whole are realizing with their selling.
This metric works by going through the on-chain history of each sold coin to see what price it was moved at before this. Assuming that the last transaction of the coin was the last point at which it changed hands, the price at its time woâ€¦

entry.title: Bitcoin Stalls As Evening Star Forms: Can BTC Bulls Still Shine?
entry.summary:
Tony â€œThe Bullâ€ Severino, the Head of Research at NewsBTC and a certified CME, has identifiedÂ an â€œEvening Starâ€ candlestick pattern on the monthly chart of the Bitcoin CME futures. This formation, which traditionally indicates a potential trend reversal, is forming at a critical point for Bitcoin.
According to Severino, there could be tell-tale signs suggesting that the Bitcoin upswing could end as the momentum fades.
The Evening Star Formation: BTC Bull Run Over?
Though there are concerns that the pattern is forming on the Bitcoin CME futures chart, it is absent from the spot BTCUSD chart on ordinary charts from Binance or Coinbase, for example. Accordingly, the lack of uniformity on charts has also left Severino questioning the reliability of the signal.Â
While the Evening Staâ€¦

entry.summary:
Shiba Inu (SHIB) whales look to be at it again following large transactions involving the meme token in the last 24 hours. As expected, these transactions have raised concerns that crypto investors might be looking to offload their tokens on the market.Â
Shiba Inu Whales Move Billions Of SHIB
On-chain data shows that Shiba Inu whales moved billions of SHIB in different transactions. In one transaction, 77.2 billion SHIB tokens were moved to a Coinbase wallet. Meanwhile, over 205 billion SHIB tokens were moved across different wallets, some of which were transferred to a Robinhood wallet.Â
The transfer of some of these tokens to crypto trading platforms, Coinbase and Robinhood, has raised suspicions that these Shiba Inu whales might be planning to sell off their holdings to make somâ€¦

Last week, the crypto investment landscape witnessed a significant exodus of capital from global crypto funds. A recent report from CoinShares highlighted nearly $1 billion net outflow from these funds, marking a historic departure from a 7-week inflow streak that had cumulatively amassed $12.3 billion.
A Closer Look At The Outflows
The magnitude of these outflows at roughlyÂ $942 million is particularly notable, almost doubling the previous record of $500 million witnessed towards the end of January.
Major players in the asset management space, including BlackRock, Bitwise, Fidelity, Grayscale, ProShares, and 21Shares, felt the brunt of this wave of withdrawals, according to CoinShares.
The timing of these outflows coincided with a notable correction in the prices of underlying câ€¦

entry.title: London Stock Exchange To Launch Bitcoin ETN Market In May
entry.summary:
The London Stock Exchange has announced that it will accept applications for the admission of Bitcoin Crypto Exchange-Traded Notes (ETNs) starting from April 8, 2024. This decision follows the Exchange's earlier notice on March 11, indicating its intention to allow the trading of Crypto ETNs in the second quarter of the year.
JUST IN: ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§ London Stock Exchange to launch market for #Bitcoin exchange traded notes on May 28. pic.twitter.com/hEStU4xUrc â€” Bitcoin Magazine (@BitcoinMagazine) March 25, 2024
Subject to approval by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) of the base prospectuses, the Exchange plans to commence trading of these ETNs on Tuesday, May 28, 2024. This move is aimed at ensuring maximum issuer participation on the first trading day and allowing issuers sufficient time to prepare their documentation and meet regulatory requirements. "We have decided to launch the market in Crypto ETNs on 28 May 2024 to enable the maximum number of issuers to be present in the market on the first day of trading," the notice stated. "In choosing this date we have taken into consideration that we need to ensure that issuers meet the requirements for consideration detailed in the Crypto ETN factsheet and importantly, it will also enable those issuers planning on admitting securities on the launch date, time to prepare documentation to establish a Crypto ETN programme which will require a base prospectus to be approved by the FCA." Issuers interested in listing securities on the Main Market on May 28 must submit the necessary information to the Exchange by April 15. This includes details on how the issuer and/or the ETN will meet the requirements outlined in the Crypto ETN factsheet and a draft of the base prospectus highlighting relevant disclosures. However, issuers failing to meet the specified requirements, submit their applications after April 15, or have their base prospectus unapproved by the FCA by midday on May 22, 2024, will not be eligible to participate in the first day of trading.

entry.title: Terraform Labs In The Hot Seat: Trial Begins As Do Kwonâ€™s Final Extradition Decision Looms
entry.summary:
Terraform Labs is set to face a high-stakes trial on Monday, grappling with civil fraud allegations linked to the collapse of its TerraUSD stablecoin in 2022. Meanwhile, Terra co-founder Do Kwon remains in Montenegro awaiting the decision on whether he will be extradited to the United States or South Korea to face criminal charges.Â
Terraform Labs Faces Trial Over $40 Billion TerraUSD Collapse
The civil case against Terraform Labs centers on fraud allegations brought forth by the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), stemming from the collapse of TerraUSD, which resulted in the loss of approximately $40 billion in investor assets.Â
According to a Bloomberg report, the trial will see a Manhattan jury deliberating the fraud claims, examining the SECâ€™s allegations regarding Terraâ€¦

entry.title: LSE Opens Doors to Bitcoin and Ethereum ETN Applications
entry.summary: In a follow-up to the Stock Exchange Notice issued on March 11, 2024, the London Stock Exchange (LSE) has disclosed its intention to commence accepting applications for the admission to trading of Bitcoin and Ethereum Crypto Exchange-Traded Notes (ETNs) from April 8, 2024. Regulatory Hurdles: FCA Approval Crucial for LSE's Crypto ETN Launch The Exchange's decision is contingent upon the approval of the base prospectuses by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA), which is necessary for listing Crypto ETNs on the Main Market and the Official List of the FCA. Pending regulatory approval, the proposed date for the commencement of trading for these Crypto ETN securities is slated for May 28, 2024. The LSE has strategically opted to launch the market for Crypto ETNs on May 28 â€¦

They also discuss his ultimate vision for Pixels and his team. Note: This interview was recorded shortly before the PIXEL token launch.

entry.title: Orangie Plays the 'Otherside' Apes Come Home Game Event With His Bored Ape
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie checked out the limited-time "Apes Come Home" event in Otherside, the Bored Ape metaverse game, and got to use his own Ape avatar. Was it worth the $75K he spent for the NFT? Check out his impressions of the experience.

entry.title: 'This is the Age of Creators': How DASTAN is Fixing the 'Broken' Media Industry
entry.summary: Following the launch of decentralized media publishing company DASTAN, its President Farokh Sarmad, CEO Loxley Fernandes, and COO Quinn Button, Ph. D joined Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz and The Nifty & BoDoggos Founder and Partner Easy to talk about the future of media.

entry.title: Inside The Mind Of a Web3 Gamer
entry.summary: Saro McKenna, Co-Founder of Alien Worlds, Linda Ang, Head of Strategy at Aelf, and Sami Chlagou, CEO of Cross the Ages joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to explore the profile of the Web3 gamer, the evolving landscape of Web3 gaming and the transition between Web2 and Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Casper Network: Opening a 'New World of Possibilities' Beyond Enterprise Users
entry.summary: Casper Network's Director of Ecosystem Alizee Carli and Head of Content Joe Benso join Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about how the Layer 1 blockchain is expanding beyond its enterprise user base to Web3-native projects.

entry.title: VanEck Web3 Lead: Tokenized Real Estate the 'Holy Grail'
entry.summary: VanEck's Head of NFT Community and Web3, Matt Bartlett, joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss the launch of its new NFT platform Segment.io, and the need for regulatory clarity in the NFT space.

entry.title: Orangie Plays 'Dookey Dash: Unclogged,' the Bored Ape Game With Over $1 Million in Prizes
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie shares a first look at an early version of Dookey Dash: Unclogged, the new free-to-play version of 2023's crypto gaming sensation. Yuga Labs is releasing the new version of the game this spring with over $1 million in prizes up for grabs.

entry.title: How Paris Saint-Germain FC Joined Chiliz as a Validator
entry.summary: Chiliz Chief Strategy Officer Max Rabinovitch joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss Paris Saint-Germain FC joining its network as a validator, and how consequential Web3 adoption in sport will come from the grassroots.
